name: Anbe Sivam
summary: Two men, one young and arrogant, the other damaged - physically but not spiritually - by life, are thrown together by circumstances, and find that they are in some ways bound together by fate.

name: Gol Maal
summary: A man's simple lie to secure his job escalates into more complex lies when his orthodox boss gets suspicious.

name: Jai Bhim
summary: When a tribal man is arrested for a case of alleged theft, his wife turns to a human-rights lawyer to help bring justice.

name: Nayakan
summary: A common man's struggles against a corrupt police force put him on the wrong side of the law. He becomes a don, who is loved and respected by many, but his growing power and influence exact a heavy toll.

name: Pariyerum Perumal
summary: A law student from a lower caste begins a friendship with his classmate, a girl who belongs to a higher caste, and the men in her family start giving him trouble over this.

name: 3 Idiots
summary: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

name: Apur Sansar
summary: This final installment in Satyajit Ray's Apu Trilogy follows Apu's life as an orphaned adult aspiring to be a writer.

name: Manichitrathazhu
summary: When a forbidden room in an old bungalow is unbolted, the spirit of a vengeful dancer is unleashed.

name: Kumbalangi Nights
summary: The film revolves around four brothers who share a love-hate relationship with each other. Their relationship progresses to another level when Saji, Boney, and Franky decide to help Bobby stand by his love.

name: Black Friday
summary: A film about the investigations following the 1993 serial Bombay bomb blasts, told through the different stories of the people involved --police, conspirators, victims, middlemen.

name: C/O Kancharapalem
summary: Four unconventional love stories set in the town and including the people of Kancherapalem.

name: Taare Zameen Par
summary: An eight-year-old boy is thought to be a lazy trouble-maker, until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.

name: #Home
summary: Oliver Twist (Indrans) wants to be tech-savvy and become a better companion to his two sons, who spend more time on their phones than with their loved ones.

name: Soorarai Pottru
summary: Nedumaaran Rajangam "Maara" sets out to make the common man fly and in the process takes on the world's most capital intensive industry and several enemies who stand in his way.

name: Dangal
summary: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.

name: Kireedam
summary: The life of a young man turns upside down when he intervenes in a dispute in order to rescue his father (a cop) from a ruthless local outlaw.

name: Kaithi
summary: Dilli, an ex-convict, endeavours to meet his daughter for the first time after leaving prison. However, his attempts are interrupted due to a drug raid planned by Inspector Bejoy.

name: Rocketry: The Nambi Effect
summary: Based on the life of ISRO Scientist Nambi Narayanan who was framed of being a spy and arrested in 1994. Though free, he is still fighting for justice, with those police officials who have falsely implicated him, still free.

name: Jersey
summary: A failed cricketer decides to revive his cricketing career in his late 30's despite everyone being skeptical of his ability to do so.

name: Thevar Magan
summary: The urbane son of a village chieftain struggles between his personal aspirations and those of his family.

name: Asuran
summary: The teenage son of a farmer from an underprivileged caste kills a rich, upper caste landlord. Will the farmer, a loving father and a pacifist by heart, be able to save his hot-blooded son is the rest of the story.
Two high school sweethearts meet at a reunion after 22 years and reminisce about their past.

name: Visaaranai
summary: Four labourers are tortured by the police to confess to a theft they have not committed.

name: Pather Panchali
summary: Impoverished priest Harihar Ray, dreaming of a better life for himself and his family, leaves his rural Bengal village in search of work.

name: Thalapathi
summary: An orphan named Surya raised in a slum befriends a good crime boss named Devaraj and works for him. Their existence is threatened when a new honest district collector arrives.

name: Natsamrat
summary: After he retires, an aging theatre actor and his wife begin to feel unwanted by their children.

name: Sarpatta Parambarai
summary: When Sarpatta Parambarai is challenged to a do-or-die match, will Kabilan, a young labourer, put on the gloves himself and lead his clan to victory, or be dissuaded by his disapproving mother and dangerous politics?

name: Drishyam 2
summary: A gripping tale of an investigation and a family which is threatened by it. Will Georgekutty be able to protect his family this time?

name: Sardar Udham
summary: A biopic detailing the 2 decades that Punjabi Sikh revolutionary Udham Singh spent planning the assassination of the man responsible for the Jallianwala Bagh massacre.

name: Thani Oruvan
summary: Siddharth Abimanyu, an influential scientist, is involved in various illegal medical practices. Mithran, an efficient IPS officer, decides to expose him.

name: Aparajito
summary: Following his father's death, a boy leaves home to study in Calcutta, while his mother must face a life alone.

name: Vada Chennai
summary: A young carrom player in north Chennai becomes a reluctant participant in a war between two warring gangsters.

name: Jaane Bhi Do Yaaro
summary: Two friends, attempting to start-up their own photo studio, come across shady dealings, corruption and murder, and must fight to bring the guilty to light.

name: Khosla Ka Ghosla!
summary: A Delhi-based retired middle-class man tries half-heartedly to get his land back from a swindling property dealer with the help of his sons and their friends.

name: Vikram
summary: A high-octane action film where a special investigator is assigned a case of serial Killings, he finds the case is not what it seems to be and leading down this path is only going to end in a war between everyone involved.

name: Drishyam
summary: A man goes to extreme lengths to save his family from punishment after the family commits an accidental crime.

name: Chupke Chupke
summary: A newly wedded husband plays a practical joke on his wife's family with full support from his wife and friends.

name: Peranbu
summary: A single father tries to raise his daughter, who has cerebral palsy, even as she is beginning to wake up to her sexuality.

name: Agent Sai Srinivasa Athreya
summary: Agent Sai Srinivasa Athreya is an authentic humorous investigative thriller revolving around the adventures of a detective based out of Nellore.

name: Anniyan
summary: Ramanujam, who suffers from multiple personality disorder, works as a lawyer by day and a vigilante at night. He uses tips from the 'Garuda Purana' as his tools to expose various antisocial elements.

name: Mahanati
summary: Biography of Savitri, an actress from South India movie industry, who ruled the industry for two decades during 50s and 60s.

name: Bangalore Days
summary: A fun roller coaster ride about three young people, Aju, Divya and Kuttan who are cousins, reach Bangalore to dream, discover and explore.

name: Satya
summary: An innocent man is embroiled in underworld after being falsely charged and sets out to punish the perpetrators who subjected his life to misery.

name: Super Deluxe
summary: An unfaithful newly-wed wife, an estranged father, a priest and an angry son suddenly find themselves in the most unexpected predicaments, each poised to experience their destiny, all on one fateful day.

name: Premam
summary: A young man has three opportunities to find love. Will the third time be the charm?

name: Ratsasan
summary: A sub-inspector sets out in pursuit of a mysterious serial killer who targets teen school girls and murders them brutally.

name: Gangs of Wasseypur
summary: A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.

name: Devasuram
summary: Neelakanthan squanders away the inheritance left by his father. However, his life turns upside down when his mother reveals a terrible secret on her deathbed that changes the course of his life.

name: Bhaag Milkha Bhaag
summary: The truth behind the ascension of Milkha Singh, who was scarred by of the India-Pakistan partition.

name: Andhadhun
summary: A series of mysterious events change the life of a blind pianist, who must now report a crime that he should technically know nothing of.

name: Drishyam
summary: Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law, after they commit an unexpected crime.

name: Aruvi
summary: A gentle girl born and brought up amidst the ever growing eco-social-consumeristic environment finds it difficult to fit in the society. She decides to take it hard on the people. What she does is the rest of the story.

name: Kannathil Muthamittal
summary: A little girl is told by her parents that she is adopted. Determined to find her real mother, she begs to be taken to Sri Lanka, where her mother works with a militant group of activists.

name: Guide
summary: When mistaken to be a sage by some villagers, an ex-tour guide reflects on his past and lost love to search for spiritual wisdom to guide the villagers.

name: Chithram
summary: A woman hires a stranger to pose as her husband because she doesn't want her ailing father to know that her fiance broke their engagement.

name: Shahid
summary: The account of Human Rights lawyer Shahid Azmi, an ordinary citizen with an extraordinary commitment to justice.

name: Iruvar
summary: A struggling actor and a writer-politician become friends as young men and rise to great heights in cinema and politics respectively. But when both become contenders for the top political post in the state, a rift develops between...

name: Sairat
summary: In interior Maharashtra, a fisherman's son and a local politician's daughter fall in love against the restrictions of caste hierarchy.

name: Vikram Vedha
summary: Vikram, a no-nonsense police officer, accompanied by Simon, his partner, is on the hunt to capture Vedha, a smuggler and a murderer. Vedha tries to change Vikram's life, which leads to a conflict.

name: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
summary: Three friends decide to turn their fantasy vacation into reality after one of their friends gets engaged.

name: Paan Singh Tomar
summary: The story of Paan Singh Tomar, an Indian athlete and seven-time national steeplechase champion who becomes one of the most feared dacoits in Chambal Valley after his retirement.

name: Tumbbad
summary: A mythological story about a goddess who created the entire universe. The plot revolves around the consequences when humans build a temple for her first-born.

name: Mudhalvan
summary: A man accepts a challenge to act as the Chief Minister of Tamil Nadu for one day only, and makes such a success of it that soon he is embroiled in political intrigue.

name: Dhuruvangal Pathinaaru
summary: A police officer retires after an accident during a case investigation. Years later, he is forced to relive the past as he narrates the story to his friend's son.

name: Chhichhore
summary: A tragic incident forces Anirudh, a middle-aged man, to take a trip down memory lane and reminisce his college days along with his friends, who were labelled as losers.

name: Spadikam
summary: A small-town criminal constantly clashes with his strict school headmaster father at the expense of their family lives.

name: Swades: We, the People
summary: A successful Indian scientist returns to an Indian village to take his nanny to America with him and in the process rediscovers his roots.

name: Black
summary: The cathartic tale of a young woman who can't see, hear, or speak, and the teacher who brings a ray of light into her dark world.

name: Chak De! India
summary: Kabir Khan, the coach of the Indian Women's National Hockey Team, dreams of making his all-girls team emerge victorious against all odds.

name: Jo Jeeta Wohi Sikandar
summary: A rich brat and a poor chap try to woo a girl, with their rivalry culminating in the most prestigious college event - the marathon cycle race.

name: 777 Charlie
summary: Dharma is stuck in a rut with his negative and lonely lifestyle and spends each day in the comfort of his loneliness. A pup named Charlie enters his life and gives him a new perspective towards it.

name: Papanasam
summary: Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law after they commit an unexpected crime.

name: Pudhu Pettai
summary: After running away from his home, Kumar falls in with a gang and slowly rises through the ranks of the criminal underworld.

name: Pyaasa
summary: A talented but indigent poet Vijay struggles for love and recognition in this selfish world.

name: Mandela
summary: A local barber's fate turns overnight when he becomes the single deciding vote in the village elections.

name: Munna Bhai M.B.B.S.
summary: A gangster sets out to fulfill his father's dream of becoming a doctor.

name: PK
summary: An alien on Earth loses the only device he can use to communicate with his spaceship. His innocent nature and child-like questions force the country to evaluate the impact of religion on its people.

name: Soodhu Kavvum
summary: Das, with his team, kidnap Arumai, son of a politician, who has been planning his own kidnapping to extract money from his father. Problems arise, when an insane cop is brought to handle the case.

name: Article 15
summary: In the rural heartlands of India, an upright police officer sets out on a crusade against violent caste-based crimes and discrimination.

name: Uri: The Surgical Strike
summary: Indian army special forces execute a covert operation, avenging the killing of fellow army men at their base by a terrorist group.

name: Queen
summary: A Delhi girl from a traditional family sets out on a solo honeymoon after her marriage gets cancelled.

name: Talvar
summary: An experienced investigator confronts several conflicting theories about the perpetrators of a violent double homicide.

name: Kaakkaa Muttai
summary: Two slum kids yearn to taste a pizza after being enticed by the pizza shop that has opened near their locality. What happens when they manage to find the money to buy one?

name: Lagaan: Once Upon a Time in India
summary: The people of a small village in Victorian India stake their future on a game of cricket against their ruthless British rulers.

name: OMG: Oh My God!
summary: A shopkeeper takes God to court when his shop is destroyed by an earthquake.

name: Jigarthanda
summary: An aspiring director targets a ruthless gangster because he wants to make a violent gangster film. His discreet attempts to research the gangster fail miserably. Finally when he gets caught snooping, things hit the fan.

name: Sarfarosh
summary: After his brother is killed and father severely injured by terrorists, a young med student quits his studies to join the Indian Police Service to wipe out the terrorists.

name: Udaan
summary: Expelled from his school, a 16-year old boy returns home to his abusive and oppressive father.

name: Barfi!
summary: Three young people learn that love can neither be defined nor contained by society's definition of normal and abnormal.

name: Theeran Adhigaaram Ondru
summary: Theeran, a police officer, is entrusted with the task to solve the mystery behind a series of murders. The only clue left behind is that all the murders are committed in the same pattern.

name: Sholay
summary: After his family is murdered by a notorious and ruthless bandit, a former police officer enlists the services of two outlaws to capture the bandit.

name: Hera Pheri
summary: Three unemployed men look for answers to all their money problems - but when their opportunity arrives, will they know what to do with it?

name: Ustad Hotel
summary: Faisi wants to go to UK to become a professional chef but circumstances force him to assist his grandfather in a small restaurant in Kozhikode city, changing his outlook on life forever.

name: The Legend of Bhagat Singh
summary: The story of a young revolutionary who raised an armed resistance against the British rule in India.

name: Rang De Basanti
summary: The story of six young Indians who assist an English woman to film a documentary on the freedom fighters from their past, and the events that lead them to relive the long-forgotten saga of freedom.

name: Angoor
summary: Based on Shakespeare's 'A Comedy of Errors', this is a story of identical twins (2 pairs) and mistaken identities.

name: Baasha
summary: An auto driver, Manikam, desperately tries to hide his dark underworld side to keep his promise to his father.

name: Masaan
summary: Along India's Ganges River, four people face prejudice, a strict moral code and a punishing caste system as they confront personal tragedies.

name: Bãhubali 2: The Conclusion
summary: When Shiva, the son of Bahubali, learns about his heritage, he begins to look for answers. His story is juxtaposed with past events that unfolded in the Mahishmati Kingdom.

name: Kahaani
summary: A pregnant woman's search for her missing husband takes her from London to Kolkata, but everyone she questions denies having ever met him.

name: Dil Chahta Hai
summary: Three inseparable childhood friends are just out of college. Nothing comes between them - until they each fall in love, and their wildly different approaches to relationships creates tension.

name: Maheshinte Prathikaram
summary: Mahesh, a studio photographer and studio owner gets into a fight and loses. He ends up taking revenge which leads to certain realizations in his life.

name: Virumandi
summary: A temperamental farmer gets embroiled in a bloody clan feud in a southern Tamil Nadu village.

name: A Wednesday
summary: A retiring police officer reminisces about the most astounding day of his career. About a case that was never filed but continues to haunt him in his memories - the case of a man and a Wednesday.

name: Roja
summary: A woman from a village in Tamil Nadu marries a sophisticated city dweller and moves with him to Kashmir, where all is rosy - until he gets kidnapped by militants.

name: Iqbal
summary: Iqbal, the deaf and mute son of a farmer, has a passion for the game of cricket and seeks the tutelage of a washed-up, alcoholic ex-player.

name: Nil Battey Sannata
summary: A story about a single woman (a Mom) and dreams on her Daughter.

name: Pink
summary: When three young women are implicated in a crime, a retired lawyer steps forward to help them clear their names.

name: Pithamagan
summary: Chittan, a social outcast, has grown up in a cemetery. A drug dealer finds him a job in a cannabis farm. In prison, he meets a conman, Shakti. This friendship transforms him from his stony existence.

name: Lage Raho Munna Bhai
summary: Munna Bhai embarks on a journey with Mahatma Gandhi in order to fight against a corrupt property dealer.

name: Kaun Pravin Tambe?
summary: An indian cricketer who shows persistence and hardwork to achieve his ultimate goal of playing a Ranji Trophy. At the penultimate stage of the career at a age when it is believed people's career ends, he starts a new chapter of hi...

name: Shershaah
summary: The story of PVC awardee Indian soldier Capt. Vikram Batra, who shot to fame and became a household name during the Kargil War in 1999.

name: Charulata
summary: The lonely wife of a newspaper editor falls in love with her visiting cousin-in-law, who shares her love for literature.

name: Anand
summary: The story of a terminally ill man who wishes to live life to the fullest before the inevitable occurs, as told by his best friend.

name: Alai Payuthey
summary: After a difficult romance in a class-divided society, the love birds find out marriage is not what they thought it would be.

name: Section 375
summary: A celebrated Bollywood director Rohan Khurana stands accused by a female member of his crew, Anjali Dangle of having raped her at his residence.

name: Bajrangi Bhaijaan
summary: An Indian man with a magnanimous heart takes a young mute Pakistani girl back to her homeland to reunite her with her family.

name: Jana Gana Mana
summary: As a college professor's brutal murder sparks student unrest, a cop launches an investigation while a lawyer seeks justice in the the courtroom.

name: Omkara
summary: A politically-minded enforcer's misguided trust in his lieutenant leads him to suspect his wife of infidelity in this adaptation of Shakespeare's 'Othello'.

name: Lucia
summary: A man suffering from insomnia is tricked into buying a drug, Lucia, that makes his desires come true in his dreams, blurring the line between fantasy and reality.

name: Bombay
summary: A Hindu man and a Muslim woman fall in love in a small village and move to Mumbai, where they have two children. However, growing religious tensions and erupting riots threaten to tear the family apart.

name: K.G.F: Chapter 2
summary: In the blood-soaked Kolar Gold Fields, Rocky's name strikes fear into his foes. While his allies look up to him, the government sees him as a threat to law and order. Rocky must battle threats from all sides for unchallenged supre...

name: Oru Vadakkan Veeragatha
summary: The film offers an alternative version of the fight between two legendary Chekavars from Chanthu's perspective.

name: Bommarillu
summary: A young man realizes that he has to push back against his domineering father if he wants to find true happiness and love.

name: Indian
summary: A veteran freedom fighter enraged with the rising crime and corruption in the society murders all the wrong doers one by one using an ancient martial arts technique.

name: K.G.F: Chapter 1
summary: In the 1970s, a gangster goes undercover as a slave to assassinate the owner of a notorious gold mine.

name: The Great Indian Kitchen
summary: After marriage, a woman struggles to be the submissive wife that her husband and his family expect her to be. The story follows her journey, as she changes herself and, even more so, changes the household.

name: Haider
summary: A young man returns to Kashmir after his father's disappearance to confront his uncle, whom he suspects of playing a role in his father's fate.

name: Rangasthalam
summary: Chitti Babu begins to suspect his elder brother's life is in danger after they team up to lock horns with their village president and overthrow his unlawful 30 year old regime.

name: Mughal-E-Azam
summary: A 16th century prince falls in love with a court dancer and battles with his emperor father.

name: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
summary: When Raj meets Simran in Europe, it isn't love at first sight but when Simran moves to India for an arranged marriage, love makes its presence felt.

name: Special Chabbis
summary: A gang of con-men rob prominent rich businessmen and politicians by posing as C.B.I and income tax officers.

name: Maqbool
summary: The intrigue of the Shakespearean tragedy 'Macbeth' is transposed to the Mumbai underworld.

name: Athadu
summary: A gunman for hire is framed for murder, and assumes a dead man's identity while hiding from the police.

name: Maanaadu
summary: On the day of a public conference by the state's Chief Minister, his bodyguard and a police officer are stuck in a time loop.

name: Andaz Apna Apna
summary: Two slackers competing for the affections of an heiress inadvertently become her protectors from an evil criminal.

name: Thadam
summary: The murder of a youngster creates confusion among cops when they discover the suspect has a lookalike.

name: Padayappa
summary: The death of Padaiyappa's father destroys his family. But his luck changes, and he is able to lead a prosperous life, until his nemesis plots to ruin his happiness once more.

name: Vaaranam Aayiram
summary: A father and son help each other through growing up, romance, tragedy, and adventure.

name: Pelli Choopulu
summary: A wannabe businesswoman and a happy-go-lucky guy meet each other during an arranged marriage blind date but eventually team up to start a food truck on their own.

name: Android Kunjappan Version 5.25
summary: Story of a conventional, conservative small town villager and his son who has to move away from home due to his profession. Their relationship gets an endearing twist when an AI humanoid enters their lives and fills in their empti...

name: Gulaal
summary: A law student witnesses deception, homicide, and crime after being elected as General Secretary of his college.

name: Gully Boy
summary: A coming-of-age story based on the lives of street rappers in Mumbai.

name: Naduvula Konjam Pakkatha Kaanom
summary: A young man forgets a few years of his life, even as he is about to get married.

name: Deewaar
summary: Vijay struggles as a dockworker and eventually becomes a leading figure of the underworld, while his younger brother Ravi is an educated, upright policeman. This divide causes problems in their relationship.

name: Ugly
summary: The case of a missing girl takes us through a journey of human greed and brushes upon the egos and repressed emotions of the characters.

name: Badhaai Ho
summary: A man is embarrassed when he finds out his mother is pregnant.

name: Vaastav: The Reality
summary: Consequences force an innocent man to get involved in crime after making an error.

name: Company
summary: A small-time gangster named Chandu teams up with Malik, a low-level enforcer for a criminal syndicate. Together they eliminate all their enemies, becoming the most feared gangsters in Mumbai.

name: Evaru
summary: Sub-inspector Vikram Vasudev is entrusted with the task of investigating the murder of a high ranking officer who was killed by his alleged rape victim. When he delves deeper into the case he uncovers some surprising facts.

name: Kshanam
summary: Rishi, a non-resident Indian, returns to India to help his ex-lover find her kidnapped daughter.

name: Ulidavaru Kandanthe
summary: A journalist sets out to uncover the truth behind an incident, through the perspectives of different people, unraveling how they and their lives are intertwined with it.

name: Padosan
summary: A simple man from a village falls in love with his new neighbor. He enlists the help of his musical-theater friends to woo the lovely girl-next-door away from her music teacher.

name: Aadukalam
summary: In a village in South India, rearing roosters, maintaining them and using them for fights are a way of life and a matter of honor and lifeline to many people.

name: Maanagaram
summary: Four youngsters arrive in a big city and their lives become interlinked.

name: Major
summary: Based on the life of Major Sandeep Unnikrishnan, who was martyred in action during the November 2008 Mumbai attacks and was consequently awarded the Ashoka Chakra, India's highest peacetime gallantry award, on 26 January 2009.

name: Nayattu
summary: Three police officers who are on a run for life, escaping the outbreak against them due to the unlawful arrest and torture of a civilian. It brings in a few shades of arrogant yet very much human police officers and their helpless...

name: Dev.D
summary: After breaking up with his childhood sweetheart, a young man finds solace in drugs. Meanwhile, a teenage girl is caught in the world of prostitution. Will they be destroyed, or will they find redemption?

name: Thondi Muthalum Driksakshiyum
summary: Prasad and Sreeja enter wedlock and move to a new place to continue the rest of their lives. Unfortunate events begin to take place after Prasad, a small-time thief, robs Sreeja's gold chain during a bus journey.

name: My Name Is Khan
summary: An Indian Muslim man with Asperger's syndrome takes a challenge to speak to the President of the United States seriously and embarks on a cross-country journey.

name: Pranchiyettan and the Saint
summary: Pranchiyettan is a successful businessman who often has talks with an imaginary St. Francis of Assisi. The story deals with how he goes about changing his embarrassing image to making a name for himself using wealth and contacts.

name: Take Off
summary: In 2014, a group of Malayali nurses was captured when terrorists took over the city of Tikrit in Iraq. This movie recounts the ordeal suffered by the nurses following their capture.

name: Kal Ho Naa Ho
summary: Naina, an introverted, perpetually depressed girl's life changes when she meets Aman. But Aman has a secret of his own which changes their lives forever. Embroiled in all this is Rohit, Naina's best friend who conceals his love fo...

name: Baishe Srabon
summary: An ex-cop is hired to track down a serial killer who carries out his killings according to Bengali poetry.

name: Arjun Reddy
summary: Arjun Reddy, a short tempered house surgeon gets used to drugs and drinks when his girlfriend is forced to marry another person.

name: Jab We Met
summary: A depressed wealthy businessman finds his life changing after he meets a spunky and care-free young woman.

name: Manjhi: The Mountain Man
summary: Using only a hammer and a chisel, a man spends twenty-two years carving a road through a treacherous mountain.

name: Ayyappanum Koshiyum
summary: The story revolves around the clash between Ayyappan, a senior police officer who serves at the Attappadi Police Station and Havildar Koshi, who comes to the village with a motive.

name: Super 30
summary: Based on the life of Patna-based mathematician Anand Kumar who runs the famed Super 30 program for IIT aspirants in Patna.

name: Dil Bechara
summary: The emotional journey of two hopelessly in love youngsters, a young girl, Kizie, suffering from cancer, and a boy, Manny, whom she meets at a support group.

name: Mukkabaaz
summary: A boxer struggles to make his mark in the boxing world.

name: Deiva Thirumagal
summary: A man with disabilities fights for custody of his 7-year-old daughter, and in the process teaches his opponent lawyer the value of love and family.

name: Karnan
summary: Karnan, a fearless village youth, must fight for the rights of the conservative people of his village, due to the torture given by a police officer.

name: Border
summary: In 1971, along the border region of Longewala, a small battalion of Indian soldiers goes up against a large Pakistani strike force.

name: Ship of Theseus
summary: The film explores questions of identity, justice, beauty, meaning and death through an experimental photographer, an ailing monk and a young stockbroker.

name: Jalsaghar
summary: Depicts the end days of a decadent zamindar (landlord) in Bengal, and his efforts to uphold his family prestige even when faced with economic adversity.

name: Vedam
summary: Stories of 5 people, an educated slum dweller, an aspiring rock star, an old villager, a prostitute and an ostracized Muslim man; all lead up to a night in a hospital filled with jeopardy.

name: Charlie
summary: A young, nonconforming woman named Tessa gets entangled in a cat-and-mouse chase in the by-lanes of Kerala, hunting for a mysterious artist who previously lived in her apartment.

name: Padman
summary: Upon realizing the extent to which women are affected by their menses, a man sets out to create a sanitary pad machine and to provide inexpensive sanitary pads to the women of rural India.

name: Rise Roar Revolt
summary: A fictitious story about two legendary revolutionaries and their journey away from home before they started fighting for their country in 1920s.

name: Salaam Bombay!
summary: Young Krishna struggles to survive among the drug dealers, pimps, and prostitutes in the back alleys and gutters of India.

name: Bãhubali: The Beginning
summary: In ancient India, an adventurous and daring man becomes involved in a decades-old feud between two warring peoples.

name: Ankhon Dekhi
summary: After a distressing incident, a Delhi man vows to believe only what he can see, but his new ideals soon take his life in extreme directions.

name: Baby
summary: An elite counter-intelligence unit learns of a plot, masterminded by a maniacal madman. With the clock ticking, it's up to them to track the terrorists' international tentacles and prevent them from striking at the heart of India.

name: Vinnaithaandi Varuvaayaa
summary: An aspiring filmmaker goes through the ups and downs of romance when he falls for a Christian woman who says she only wants to be friends.

name: Malik
summary: A past ridden with crime, death and pain is recounted to Freddy, a juvenile criminal, who has been assigned to eliminate his estranged uncle Sulaiman, an aging patriarch, while behind bars.

name: Pizza
summary: A pizza delivery boy lands in a mysterious circumstance and it works a dramatic change in his life.

name: M.S. Dhoni: The Untold Stor
summary: The untold story of Mahendra Singh Dhoni's journey from ticket collector to trophy collector - the world-cup-winning captain of the Indian Cricket Team.

name: Kirik Party
summary: Kirik Party is the story of a gang of mischievous students, lead by the protagonist Karna (Rakshit Shetty), who has just joined an engineering college.

name: English Vinglish
summary: A quiet, sweet tempered housewife endures small slights from her well-educated husband and daughter every day because of her inability to speak and understand English.

name: Hindi Medium
summary: A couple from Chandni Chowk aspire to give their daughter the best education and thus be a part of and accepted by the elite of Delhi.

name: Lakshya
summary: An aimless, jobless, irresponsible grown man joins the army and matures into a battlefield hero.

name: Dor
summary: Two woman --different backgrounds, miles apart, and strangers to each other-- are linked by tragedy. Their new-found friendship is tested as one holds the fate of the other's husband in her hands.

name: Airlift
summary: When Iraq invades Kuwait in August 1990, a callous Indian businessman becomes the spokesperson for more than 170,000 stranded countrymen.

name: Memories
summary: Sam Alex, a drunkard ex-cop, is forced to investigate a series of murders which are committed in the same pattern. His search leads to a serial killer, and something more than what he expected.

name: Johnny Gaddaar
summary: Police officers recount a tale of missing money which results in lies, deceit, betrayal and death.

name: Joseph
summary: The story develops through the life of four retired policemen. It has the tone of a thriller investigation. An issue affecting the life of Joseph, the central character, and his family is being investigated.

name: Hey Ram
summary: Saketh Ram's wife is raped and killed during direct action day riots in Calcutta. He is convinced that Mahatma Gandhi is responsible for all the problems happening in the country and sets out to kill him.

name: Kaakha..Kaakha: The Police
summary: After a police team kills his brother, a drug-dealing gangster vows to kill the entire team and their respective families.

name: Hridayam
summary: The emotional journey of Arun, his carefree bachelor days in engineering college, and how he matures through various phases of life.

name: The Tashkent Files
summary: Revolves around the mysterious death of India's 2nd Prime Minister Shri Lal Bahadur Shastri and attempts to uncover if he had actually died a natural death, or, as alleged, was assassinated.

name: Gangaajal
summary: An IPS officer motivates and leads a dysfunctional, corrupt police force of Tezpur to fight against the corrupt politician.

name: Vettaiyaadu Vilaiyaadu
summary: A Police Officer investigates a series of brutal rapes and murders, with the culprits seeming to cover more than one country.

name: Anjaam Pathiraa
summary: The police are on the trail of a serial killer, but with the victims being fellow officers, will they be able to catch the killer and solve the case in time?

name: Mumbai Police
summary: ACP Antony is the only one who knows the truth behind ACP Aaryan's murder. Antony meets with an accident, losing his memory and is unable to reveal the killer. He is forced to investigate the murder again hoping that he remembers ...

name: The Lunchbox
summary: A mistaken delivery in Mumbai's famously efficient lunchbox delivery system connects a young housewife to an older man in the dusk of his life as they build a fantasy world together through notes in the lunchbox.

name: Ab Tak Chhappan
summary: An honest encounter specialist's life begins to change with the arrival of a new police commissioner who has ties with a local don.

name: Okkadu
summary: A Kabbadi player rescues a young woman from an unwanted marriage and hides her in his home.

name: Unnaipol Oruvan
summary: A retiring police officer remembers a thrilling case of his life which is not recorded in any case files.

name: Secret Superstar
summary: A talented teenage singer-songwriter living amid domestic abuse becomes a YouTube sensation after a video in which she hides her identity goes viral.

name: Pokiri
summary: Krishna, a police officer, disguises himself as a thug and joins the mafia in order to wipe out the underworld.

name: Angamaly Diaries
summary: Vincent Pepe who wanted to be a powerful leader of a righteous gang that ruled the city, like his seniors. And then there's the rival clan with the malicious gangsters of Angamaly a locale on which the film is based.

name: Thuppakki
summary: An army captain is on a mission to track down and destroy a terrorist gang and deactivate the sleeper cells under its command.

name: Oopiri
summary: Impressed by his carefree attitude, quadriplegic multi-billionaire Vikram hires a convict out on parole as his caretaker. What follows is a string of life lessons they learn from each other.

name: Manam
summary: Through reincarnation, family members are able to cross generations and meddle in each others' lives.

name: Vicky Donor
summary: A man is brought in by an infertility doctor to supply him with his sperm, where he becomes the biggest sperm donor for his clinic.

name: Ghilli
summary: Velu, an aspiring kabaddi player, goes to Madurai to participate in a regional match, where he rescues Dhanalakshmi from Muthupandi, a powerful man keen on marrying the girl against her will.

name: Mother India
summary: In this melodrama, a poverty-stricken woman raises her sons through many trials and tribulations. But no matter the struggles, always sticks to her own moral code.

name: RangiTaranga
summary: Mysterious events begin to unfold after a reclusive novelist and his wife move back to her ancestral village, followed by a journalist.

name: Veer Zara
summary: "Veer-Zaara" is a saga of love, separation, courage, and sacrifice. A love story that is an inspiration and will remain a legend forever.

name: Stanley Ka Dabba
summary: A school-teacher, who forces children to share their food with him, forbids one from entering the school until he brings his own Tiffin/Lunch-box.

name: Mimi
summary: Mimi is introduced by Bhanu to an American couple as a surrogate in exchange for Rs 2 million. She decides to have the baby even when they change their mind and tells her parent that Bhanu is the father.

name: Rock On!!
summary: Four friends reunite to relive their moments of glory as a rock band.

name: Kaththi
summary: A case of mistaken identity embroils an escaped convict in a fight against a large corporation intent on seizing a village's land.

name: Udta Punjab
summary: A story that revolves around drug abuse in the affluent north Indian State of Punjab and how the youth there have succumbed to it en-masse resulting in a socio-economic decline.

name: Nayak: The Real Hero
summary: A man accepts a challenge by the chief minister of Maharashtra to run the state for one day, and makes such a success of it that soon he is embroiled in political intrigue.

name: Mr. India
summary: A poor but big-hearted man takes orphans into his home. After discovering his scientist father's invisibility device, he rises to the occasion and fights to save his children and all of India from the clutches of a megalomaniac.

name: Dia
summary: Dia takes three years to confess her feelings to Rohith but after a terrible accident, she is told he does not survive. Later, when she starts seeing Adi, she finds out that Rohith is still alive.

name: Badla
summary: A dynamic young entrepreneur finds herself locked in a hotel room with the corpse of her dead lover. She hires a prestigious lawyer to defend her and they work together to figure out what actually happened.

name: Happy Days
summary: A group of eight youngsters from an engineering college form an unbreakable friendship after going through various struggles.

name: Raazi
summary: A Kashmiri woman agrees to marry a Pakistani army officer in order to spy on Pakistan during the Indo-Pakistan War of 1971.

name: Minnal Murali
summary: An unusual event creates a lightning which in turns gives superhuman abilies to an ambitious tailor ,whose responsibility is now to protect his home village from the evil plans of the antagonist.

name: Sonchiriya
summary: Set in the Chambal valley, the film follows the story of a legion of dreaded, warring dacoits who once terrorized the Indian heartlands.

name: Thulladha Manamum Thullum
summary: Kutty is a good-hearted soul, but unfortunate incidents tend to portray his ruffian side whenever he encounters the girl he loves. A bizarre incident brings them closer and yet keeps them apart.

name: Dasvidaniya
summary: A man who loves to make "to-do lists" makes one last bucket list when he realizes he is about to die.

name: Ayirathil Oruvan
summary: Anitha, a government official, embarks on a journey to find Chandramouli, an archaeologist, who went to Vietnam to search for any existence of the prince of the Chola dynasty.

name: Poove Unakkaga
summary: When a man realizes that the Hindu woman he loves is in love with a Christian man, he decides to sacrifice his love and unite their families so as to make the love story a success.

name: Kai Po Che!
summary: Three friends growing up in India at the turn of the millennium set out to open a training academy to produce the country's next cricket stars.

name: Joji
summary: Joji, an engineering dropout and the youngest son of a rich family lives with his aspirations of becoming super wealthy. Driven by greed and blind ambition, he decides to execute his plans following an unexpected event in the family.

name: Goodachari
summary: A young NSA agent is framed for the murder of his bosses making him realize that now his mission is darker than expected and has some personal scores to settle regarding his father's death, a former NSA agent.

name: Ko
summary: Ashwin, a famous photographer, works with Renuka, an investigative journalist. When one of their colleagues, Saro, gets killed during a political meet, Ashwin and Renuka decide to investigate.

name: Don
summary: Don, a wanted criminal, dies in a police chase. DSP D'Silva is the only one who knows about his death, and to get hold of the gang he trains Don-lookalike Vijay. But Vijay faces danger from the police and from within the gang.

name: Aligarh
summary: A gay, linguistic professor living in a small orthodox city must deal with the aftermath of a sting operation that puts his sexual orientation in front of the entire nation.

name: Ennu Ninte Moideen
summary: Based on the real-life love story of Moideen and Kanchanamala, which happened in the 1960s in the backdrop of Calicut.

name: Guru
summary: A villager, Gurukant Desai, arrives in Bombay 1958, and rises from its streets to become the GURU, the biggest tycoon in Indian history.
A scientist invents a time machine, which leads to a bitter battle between his evil twin brother and his son.

name: Velaiilla Pattadhari
summary: A jobless young man gets to redeem himself.

name: Kapoor & Sons
summary: The story about two brothers who visit their dysfunctional family for their grandfather's birthday party.

name: Colour Photo
summary: A tragic-comedy that is set in the 90s between two different personalities coming from different backgrounds that change their lives in a tale of love.

name: Rockstar
summary: Janardhan Jakhar chases his dreams of becoming a big Rock star, during which he falls in love with Heer.
